attributes.action: Redistribute to food banks, supermarkets or restaurants left over products.
attributes.additional_details:
India and Germany have created the idea of opening street fridges for poor and homeless.
Not saying we have to have fridges but the amount of food banks are increasing and this can be a great solution not only to share but also reduce pollution.
attributes.background:
Supermarkets and Restaurants bin left over products every single day which can be redistributed to food banks or associations that help the poor and homeless instead of increasing the amount of pollution in the country and the world too.
Thank you
